meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plain or unattractive in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The homeliness of the old house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the homeliness of a small, cozy cafe over a fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: Despite its homeliness, the quirky little teapot became a beloved family heirloom.
meanings.sent4: The homeliness of the abandoned factory was a stark reminder of its former glory.
meanings.sent5: The homeliness of the handmade quilt brought warmth to the room.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being comfortable or cozy in a simple way.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, I always look forward to the homeliness of my favorite armchair.
meanings.sent2: The homeliness of the cabin in the woods was a welcome retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city.
meanings.sent3: The homeliness of the campfire brought a sense of peace to the weary travelers.
meanings.sent4: She found homeliness in the familiar scent of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent5: The homeliness of the small town made it feel like a warm embrace.
